metadata.name: Suspicious ASPX File Drop by Exchange
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious file type dropped by an Exchange component in IIS into a suspicious folder

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\w3wp.exe')) AND contains(lower(actor.process.cmd_line), lower('msexchange')) AND (contains(lower(file.path), lower('frontend\\httpproxy\\')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\inetpub\\wwwroot\\aspnet_client\\'))) AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.aspx')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.asp')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.ashx'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious file type dropped by an Exchange component in IIS into a suspicious folder
